name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene GRAY, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene GRAY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Sarah Vandenbraak, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
449 A.2d 1388
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Eugene GRAY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 20, 1982.
Decided Sept. 24, 1982.
Ronald Ervais, (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Sarah Vandenbraak, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
